valueProp: Arye, Lustig & Sassower, P.C. is a premier New York law firm dedicated to representing individuals who have been injured or wronged. With over 50 years of experience, our attorneys bring a wealth of knowledge and a proven track record of success to every case. We are committed to fighting for the rights of our clients and their families, ensuring they receive the justice and compensation they deserve.
